summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear and testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The subpoena is dated November 15, 2021, and orders the recipient to appear on November 29, 2021, at the federal courthouse in Manhattan.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)) for which the subpoena is issued.

persons.name: Damian Williams
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued the subpoena.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear in court to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 318, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on November 15, 2021, for testimony in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
The subpoena commands the recipient to appear on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at the federal courthouse in Manhattan.
The subpoena was issued and signed by Damian Williams, the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.
Failure to comply with the subpoena is stated to constitute contempt of court and subject the recipient to civil and criminal penalties.
